name: Jordan Sparks
bio: Innovative and detail-oriented web frontend developer passionate about crafting engaging, accessible, and high-performance user interfaces.
title: Jordan Sparks - Web Frontend Developer

about.longbio: With over 8 years of experience in the tech industry, I specialize in designing and implementing responsive, high-performance web applications. I strive to blend innovative design with robust technology to deliver seamless digital experiences.

content.subtext: React, JavaScript, Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, GraphQL
Code splitting, Lazy loading, SEO best practices

workExperience.description: Leading a team to architect and build scalable, user-centered web applications using modern frameworks like React and Next.js.
Developed interactive and responsive web interfaces, optimized for performance and usability across various devices.
Collaborated with designers and backend developers to implement seamless UI/UX solutions for diverse client projects.
Contributed to the development of client websites with a focus on clean design and consistent performance.

projects.title: React Dashboard
projects.description: A dynamic admin dashboard built with React and TypeScript, emphasizing data visualization and interactivity.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Developed a scalable e-commerce solution featuring dynamic product listings, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A sleek and responsive personal portfolio website showcasing projects and professional experiences.

projects.title: Progressive Web App
projects.description: A feature-rich progressive web app leveraging service workers for offline capabilities and enhanced performance.

projects.title: Interactive Blog Template
projects.description: A fully interactive blog template designed with a focus on performance, accessibility, and a seamless reading experience.
